content.en: Geotechnical prediction: Researchers have been exploring the use of various algorithms to improve the accuracy and efficiency of predicting dam deformation, displacement of landslides, and other geotechnical phenomena. These algorithms include support vector machines, double exponential smoothing, kernel extreme learning machines, and more. By combining these algorithms with other methods and optimization techniques, scientists aim to develop prediction models that can accurately forecast these natural events and improve dam health monitoring.
content.da: Geoteknisk forudsigelse: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af forudsigelser af dæmningers deformation, forskydning af jordskred og andre geotekniske fænomener. Disse algoritmer inkluderer support vektor maskiner, dobbelt eksponentiel udjævning, kernel extreme learning machines og mere. Ved at kombinere disse algoritmer med andre metoder og optimeringsteknikker, sigter forskere mod at udvikle forudsigelsesmodeller, der kan præcist forudsige disse naturfænomener og forbedre overvågningen af dæmningers tilstand.
